description: nude striding figure holding a sheaf of wheat in front of body beneath PL arm, with a scythe in PR hand; sheaves of wheat at left, uncut wheat at right
inscription: in lower margin of mount in pencil: (various notes and measurements, with some crossouts, including:) Notice to engraver / Valueable drawing. Do not mark or soil. | on back of mount in pencil: (various numbers, with some crossouts) Property of / Mrs. Albert Sterner / 25 West 49. St.
signed: below image in black ink: Rockwell Kent . Vermont . 1921.
title: Harvester
